about_the_game:
Embark on an interstellar odyssey in this exhilarating 2D space strategy game, where you command a fleet of ships against rival factions in a battle for cosmic dominance. Traverse vast galaxies, charting unexplored systems. Engage in thrilling real-time tactical combat, command your fleet, and strategically deploying your arsenal of customizable ships and advanced weaponry to outmaneuver and outgun your adversaries in thrilling battles. Are you ready to conquer the cosmos?

KEY FEATURES

• Epic Space Exploration: Traverse a vast and procedurally generated universe filled with planets, star systems, and anomalies waiting to be discovered.

• Equip And Upgrade Your Ships: Collect resources from star systems to customize each ship with unique systems and upgrade their components for maximum efficiency.

• Rogue-Like Star Maps: Navigate through hazardous star maps where hazards require you to adjust strategies, encounter random events offering extra missions, and adjust difficulty and game length to your preference.

• Tweak Ship Systems For Max Performance: Balance ship energy and crew, activate special ship component abilities, and adjust shield quadrants to fit your tactics in battle.

• Earn Or Purchase Additional Ships: Unlock and try 6 galactic factions, choose from 42 playable ships, and earn command points with each game to expand your fleet further.

• Thrilling Real-Time Tactical Combat: Engage in intense battles where every decision counts, and strategic positioning and timely deployment of abilities can turn the tide of war in your favor.

• Stunning Visuals and Immersive Soundtrack: Experience thrilling 2D graphics and an immersive soundtrack that bring the vastness of space and the intensity of battles to life on your screen.

Prepare for an epic journey across the stars, where only the strongest will survive. Download Zenith Armada now and forge your destiny among the galaxies!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: penGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable.
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gnome desktop environment running on top of X11 windowing system Other configuration and user environment as provided stock with the supported distribution (such as Kernel or Compositor) Nvidia and AMD GPUs using Nvidia official proprietary graphics driver or AMD Mesa graphics driver.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mojave 10.14+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.

name: Zenith Armada

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
